QuestData.Title: I Will Remember
QuestData.Description:
I... I need a few moments, please.
Go back to Camp Nowhere, $p. I will meet you there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Rannan outside of Camp Nowhere.
QuestData.RewardText:
It was only at the very end that I began to appreciate Lathos. I took his patience and experience for granted.
We owe him our lives.
<Rannan looks towards the Ruins of Karnthar.>
I will never forget him.
